item.description:
I'm still in the process of my move to Northern Vermont and I don't have all my fancy computers and software for photos and links set up ... but my friend Ed is working away at his remaining NEHH list and we'll be doing a thru-hike Vermont's Long Trail to Jay Peak and Big Jay, with an ascent of North Jay as well.

This is a dog-fun, dog-friendly hike (and Mike is coming) ... if you don't like dogs, don't come.

We're meeting at the  Jay Village Inn  for a quick bite, spot a car a the end and drive around to the north to start.  This is about an 11.7 mile hike, about 4,350 elevation change, and I estimate we'll start around 10 a.m. and end at around 6 p.m.

Here's directions from Manchester NH  ... point "B" is the meetup place, "C" is the car spot, and "D" is the hike start.  Please, NO ONE SHOULD GO TO POINT D FIRST.  If you don't want to meet for breakfast, plan to arrive at Point "C" by 9 a.m.

Please post your contact information ... here's mine:  Jmmoran@nycap.rr.com, 518-281-5882. See you there!

-- Julie and Mike.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for my green Honda Element ...
item.name: LAST MINUTE! NEHH Series -- The Jays (VT)
